name: Cyber Bug Wars
description:
Cyber Bug Wars

In this multiplayer game you play as the king of the bugs, try to collect as many as bugs to expand your colony and win the game before others, you can make bugs to join you by colliding with them, they are all over the map, also you can steal others bugs as well! This game is an open source online multiplayer game made for WOWIE 2.0 game jam 2020. <No Game Engine! Completely made by javasript/P5js/Nodejs/Socket.io/HTML5> developer: Cena Abachi gmail: devloger.io@gmail.com Special thanks to  Jonas Tyroller Note: Experiencing lag is due to a free Heroku server that I have hosted my game server on, I'm so sorry.

Music credit: https://freesound.org/people/dAmbient/
